    • Uses of TextFormat in playn.core

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected TextFormat AbstractTextLayout.format 
      Methods in playn.core that return TextFormat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextFormat TextLayout.format()
      The TextFormat used to lay out this text.
      TextFormat AbstractTextLayout.format() 
      TextFormat TextFormat.withAlignment(TextFormat.Alignment align)
      Deprecated. 
      Use Graphics#layoutText(String,TextFormat,float) and render the wrapped lines individually (aligning them as desired).
      TextFormat TextFormat.withAntialias(boolean antialias)
      Returns a clone of this text format with antialias configured as specified.
      TextFormat TextFormat.withFont(Font font)
      Returns a clone of this text format with the font configured as specified.
      TextFormat TextFormat.withWrapping(float wrapWidth, TextFormat.Alignment align)
      Deprecated. 
      Use Graphics#layoutText(String,TextFormat,float) and render the wrapped lines individually.
      TextFormat TextFormat.withWrapWidth(float wrapWidth)
      Deprecated. 
      Use Graphics#layoutText(String,TextFormat,float) and render the wrapped lines individually.
      Methods in playn.core with parameters of type TextFormat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextLayout Graphics.layoutText(String text, TextFormat format)
      Lays out a single line of text using the specified format.
      TextLayout[] Graphics.layoutText(String text, TextFormat format, TextWrap wrap)
      Lays out multiple lines of text using the specified format and wrap configuration.
